name: TechFlow
about: TechFlow is a leading developer tools company building the future of software development. We create intuitive tools that help developers ship better code faster.

name: Nimbus Health
about: Nimbus Health is transforming healthcare through innovative digital solutions. Our platform connects patients with providers for seamless, personalized care.

name: Quantum Finance
about: Quantum Finance is a next-generation fintech company democratizing access to investment tools. We believe everyone deserves smart financial guidance.

name: GreenPath
about: GreenPath is on a mission to make sustainable living accessible. Our apps help individuals and businesses reduce their environmental footprint.

name: DataStream
about: DataStream provides enterprise-grade data analytics solutions. We help companies turn raw data into actionable insights.
